__TOC__

This page keeps track of the current release status of the Ubuntu ARM Team
* OMAP4 sound is still highest prio and being worked on
* Video SYNC loss errors showed up with latest kernel, these are being inspected atm.
* TI PPA install works fully again (packages from TI still missing in the PPA, but SGX drivers are there)
* unity-2d upstream works on a final bugfix release to be uploaded on monday 

==== Image Status ====

* Netbook images are fine.
* Headless/serial image works fine.
 
=== Specs ===

Progress:
* Entire http://people.canonical.com/~platform/workitems/natty/ubuntu-armel.html

=== Bugs ===

bugs with Fix released

* Bug:747247 No TI icon in favorites on omap4 netbook image
* Bug:744862 /proc/cpuinfo strings for OMAP4 devices changed with 2.6.38 kernels
* Bug:746137 Page allocation failure on omap4
* Bug:633227 OMAP4 crashes with highmem activated

* Bug:651302 [natty] No sound in omap3 (beagle, beagleXM)
* Bug:753071 [natty] DRM OMAP driver EDID detection
* Bug:758961 [natty] omap4 tty_mutex.c oops
